plot: An elementary school girl becomes pregnant to one of her classmates. The other students keep the secret and follow the pregnancy with interest. Eventually it is the students who deliver the baby.
title: Kodomo no kodomo
plot_es: An elementary school girl becomes pregnant to one of her classmates. The other students keep the secret and follow the pregnancy with interest. Eventually it is the students who deliver the baby.
plot_en: An elementary school girl becomes pregnant to one of her classmates. The other students keep the secret and follow the pregnancy with interest. Eventually it is the students who deliver the baby.
